rules_text:
[i]Iron Darts[/i] – Whenever Cordelia, Perfect Ninja enters or attacks, she deals 1 damage to target creature.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Cordelia attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Cordelia deals 1 damage to target opponent.
Ninjutsu {1}{W} [i]({1}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
